import "./Home.css" import React,{useState,useEffect} from 'react' import {BrowserRouter,Route,Routes} from "react-router-dom" import { Link ,useParams } from "react-router-dom" function Home() { const youtubeList=[ { title:"Titanic", poster:"http", img:"./Titanic.jpeg", type:"Film" }, { title:"StarWars", poster:"http", img:"./starwar.jpeg", type:"Film" }, { title:"MAMA", poster:"http", img:"./MaMa.jpg", type:"Film" }, { title:"BlackForest", poster:"http", img:"./Black_Forest.jpg", type:"Cooking" }, { title:"Bonda", poster:"http", img:"./Bonda.jpg", type:"Cooking" }, { img:"./American.jpg", type:"Film" }, { title:"Time Rush", poster:"http", img:"./TimeRush.jpg", type:"Cartoon" }, { title:"Chathuram", poster:"http", img:"./Chathuram.avif", type:"Film" }, { title:"Excaliber", poster:"http", img:"./Excaliber.jpg", type:"Cartoon" }, { title:"Peppa Pig", poster:"http", img:"./peppapig.jpg", type:"Cartoon" }, { title:"Mickey Mouse", poster:"http", img:"./Disney.jpg", type:"Cartoon" }, { title:"OOgy the Cockroach", poster:"http", img:"./OOgy.jpg", type:"Cartoon" }, { title:"Arcane", poster:"http", img:"./Arcane.jpg", type:"Cartoon" }, { title:"Mr.Bean", poster:"http", img:"./Bean.jpg", type:"Comedy" }, { title:"Bhai", poster:"http", img:"./Bhai.jpg", type:"Comedy" }, { title:"Harry Porter", poster:"http", img:"./HarryPorter.jpg", type:"Comedy" }, { title:"Good News", poster:"http", img:"./GoodNews.jpg", type:"Comedy" }, { title:"Hatty Boy", poster:"http", img:"./HattyBoy.jpg", type:"Comedy" }, ] const[color,setColor] = useState("grey") const click = () => { setColor("black") } // useEffect(()=>{document.getElementsByClassName("youtubebtn").color=color},[color]) const[youtube,setYoutube]=useState(youtubeList) const youTubeItems =(type)=>{ let newyoutubeitems=youtubeList.filter((tubeitem)=>tubeitem.type==type) setYoutube(newyoutubeitems) } const allYoutube =() =>{ setYoutube(youtubeList) } return( <>
